axe.name: Golden Axe
axe.unfinished: Break 100 axes of any kind to unlock the golden axe.
axe.finished: Congratulations on breaking 100 axes and earning the golden axe!

shovel.name: Golden Shovel
shovel.unfinished: Save Gulliver 30 times to unlock the golden shovel.
shovel.finished: Congratulations on saving Gulliver 30 times and earning the golden shovel!

wateringCan.name: Golden Watering Can
wateringCan.unfinished: Reach a 5-star Island rating at Isabelle!
wateringCan.finished: Congratulations on reaching a 5-star Island rating and earning the golden watering can!

slingshot.name: Golden Slingshot
slingshot.unfinished: Shoot down 300 Balloons ("It's raining treasure" achievement)!
slingshot.finished: Congrats on shooting down 300 balloons and earning the golden slingshot!

fishingRod.name: Golden Fishing Rod
fishingRod.finished: Congratulations on catching every fish and earning the golden fishing rod!

bugNet.name: Golden Bug Net
bugNet.finished: Congratulations on catching every bug and earning the golden bug net!
